svg.style: fill-opacity: 1; color-interpolation: auto; stroke: black; text-rendering: auto; stroke-linecap: square; stroke-miterlimit: 10; stroke-opacity: 1; shape-rendering: auto; fill: black; stroke-dasharray: none; font-weight: normal; stroke-width: 1; font-family: 'Dialog'; font-style: normal; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-dashoffset: 0pt; image-rendering: auto;

g.style: fill: red; font-family: monospace; stroke: white;
